sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.system_update_set_preview" name="System Update Sets Preview" state="published" version="1.0.0" help="System_Update_Sets_Preview" provider_name="ServiceNow"> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.system_update_set"/> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PreviewProblemChecker" class="com.glide.update.preview.problem.PreviewProblemChecker"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description/> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=System_Update_Sets_Preview</help> <id>com.glide.system_update_set_preview</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>System Update Sets Preview</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.system_update_set_preview/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.system_update_set</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>.glide.system_update_set_preview</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
